name: DivotMat Practice Tee Box Standard Set
short_description: The only Practice/Training tool that shows you instantly what your club is doing at the precise instant it hits the ball. This is the secret to FAST improvement to your ball striking. See exactly what’s happening at the moment of impact then intuitively make adjustments to your swing, stance, grip, and try again getting immediate feedback of how those changes affected your swing at impact. The standard set includes the DivotMat tee box, 1 pack of DivotMat replacement sheets, 2 instructional DVDs, and the DivotMat travel bag.

name: DivotMat Practice Golf Club - 5 Iron
short_description: A high quality cavity back 5 iron comes with a modified collapsible shaft which locks in place with a slight pull. When collapsed it fits conveniently in the DivotMat carry bag, or even your brief case for practice anywhere, anytime.

name: DivotMat Practice Golf Club - 5 Iron - Right
short_description: A high quality cavity back 5 iron comes with a modified collapsible shaft which locks in place with a slight pull. When collapsed it fits conveniently in the DivotMat carry bag, or even your brief case for practice anywhere, anytime.

name: DivotMat Practice Golf Club - 5 Iron - Left
short_description: A high quality cavity back 5 iron comes with a modified collapsible shaft which locks in place with a slight pull. When collapsed it fits conveniently in the DivotMat carry bag, or even your brief case for practice anywhere, anytime.

name: DivotMat Practice Tee Box Refill Pack
short_description: This pack of 36 DivotMat replacement sheets is enough for months of practice! The DivotMat replacement sheets are made from rip-resistant durable material that allows them to be struck over and over. We recommend hitting each sheet approximately 30-40 times.

name: DivotMat Practice Tee Box
short_description: The DivotMat Tee Box with Lifetime Warrantee. The only Practice/Training tool that shows you instantly what your club is doing at the precise instant it hits the ball. This is the secret to FAST improvement to your ball striking. The DivotMat Tee Box protects the ground around the striking area to make indoor practice convenient. It also absorbs the shock from a deep divot. Practice anywhere to develop the required muscle memory and awareness that develops consistency!

name: DivotMat Practice Tee Box Ultimate Set
short_description: The only Practice/Training tool that shows you instantly what your club is doing at the precise instant it hits the ball. This is the secret to FAST improvement to your ball striking. See exactly what’s happening at the moment of impact then intuitively make adjustments to your swing, stance, grip, and try again getting immediate feedback of how those changes affected your swing at impact. The standard set includes the DivotMat tee box, the DivotMat 5 iron club, 4 packs of DivotMat replacement sheets, 2 instructional DVDs, and the DivotMat travel bag.

name: DivotMat Golf Training DVDs
short_description: TWO Instructional DVDs by Pebble Beach Professional Golf Coach Larid Small. Larid Small helped develop a product to train golfers to be able to learn and develop consistency. These DVDs demonstrate Larid’s path to a better golf game.

name: Six Rule Golf Bag Tag Set
short_description: This is perfect for junior golfers, or anyone that's learning to play golf. Never again forget what that red stake on the course, because with the tag golf rule set, the answer is right there attached to your golf bag. They make golf's common rules easy to remember, and help you play by the book.

name: Know Your Distance Golf Bag Tag
short_description: The Know Your Distance golf bag tag is perfect for the junior golfer or junior golf instructor. Don't know which club to hit at 100 yards? Know exactly which club to choose every time, because this tag is a distance chart for all your clubs attached right to your golf bag.

name: Golf Bag ID Tag
short_description:
The golf bag accessory ID tag can be used as a travel tag, team id tag, or just an id tag in case your golf bag gets lost. Make it easy for the person trying to return your golf bag to you, it's owner. These credit card sized golf bag tags have room for your name and your contact info/team. This tag comes with a comes with a carabiner that attaches to your golf bag.

For best results, se a Sharpie marker when filling in the tag information.

name: Golf Gym PowerSwing Trainer
short_description: The GolfGym PowerSwing Trainer Strengthens all of the Golf Specific Muscles in Your Swing. It is Easy to Use and IT WORKS in just 3 minutes a day.

name: Golf Gym Double Handled  8 Pound Powerball
short_description: The GolfGym Double Handled 8 pound PowerBall is a great training tool to help develop core strength, rotation and balance.  The handles are designed to comfortably allow any size hand.  It can be used with one or two hands.

name: Golf Gym Training Impact Bag
short_description:
Every player attempts to get the club on line & square at impact. A breakdown of the left wrist and collapse of the leading arm at that moment are two of the most common problems faced by players of all skill levels. Impact Bag is one of the most popular training aids of all time for the following reason – there is only one moment of truth in the golf swing – Impact! This device teaches the correct position and feel for that moment.

Unlike hitting a car tire or other hard object the Impact Bag is safe and has been designed specifically for golfers. Developing a strong left side while turning into the ball will help eliminate many of the inconsistencies brought on by left wrist collapse & will help bring you into a solid, assertive impact. The Impact Bag also comes with a special slice cure supplement, guaranteed to cure your slice in 60 seconds.

name: Orange Whip Trainer for Kids
short_description: The Orange Whip will help you find your ideal swing plane, create "tour pro" lag, achieve perfect sequence of motion and promote balance that's supported from the ground up. Your strength, flexibility, and swing speed will increase, and your shot-making will become more accurate and consistent.

name: Orange Whip Trainer Putting Wand
short_description: The Orange Whip Putting Wand helps you improve your putting rhythm and tempo by taking your hands out of the stroke and synchronizing your arms and body together, thanks to its flexible shaft. The spherical face exaggerates off-center hits and assists in developing "center contact" for a truer roll. It battles the yips and deceleration and improves distance and direction control.

name: Golf Training Aid Putting Stick - TPK Golf
short_description:
The Putting Stick is a patented practice and training aid developed to help golfers of all levels improve their putting stroke

Made from the finest quality materials to exacting standards, this ingenious tool will transform both your game and attitude, forever

An adjustable back-swing stop and a ball ramp for easy loading of a golf ball onto its surface

It shows your stroke accuracy at impact to within better than one degree of perfect squareness

PGA Tour Players currently using The Putting Stick

name: ReadyPutt Blade/Mid-Mallet
short_description: ReadyPutt is built to remove debris from your golf ball. Place the Tri-Layer Ball Cleaner under a water source to absorb water and maintain a wet cleaning surface throughout your round. ReadyPutt also contains a Magnetic Surface to secure metal accessories such as Divot Repair Tool and Ball Marker. You will arrive at the green with everything you need to prepare your putt!

short_description:

ReadyPutt also contains a Magnetic Surface to secure metal accessories such as Divot Repair Tool and Ball Marker. You will arrive at the green with everything you need to prepare your putt!

name: Misses Reversible Performance Wear Green Pokadot/Black Reversible Shirt
short_description: Our performance reversible golf skorts and sleeveless tops are a must have. They are made of double layered poly-spandex so they stretch with you and the fabric is made with UPF50+ UV protection to protect you from the suns. These skorts and sleeveless tops are made right here in the USA and are 100% reversible. This means you get 4 looks in one, which comes in handy when you are on the road at those 2-day events. You'll save on room in your bag and look great when you get there with our non-wrinkle fabrics. Our performance reversible golf line has a more youthful and colorful look than your average golf skort. For a complete ensemble, pair this skort with our sleeveless reversible top.
